title: News24.com | SANDF mobilised in one of the biggest deployment in country’s history
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has informed Parliament that he authorised the deployment of an additional 73 180 members of the South African National Defence Force to assist the police in battling the spread of Covid-19.
content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa has informed Parliament that he authorised the deployment of an additional 73 180 members of the South African National Defence Force (SANDF) to assist the police in battling the spread of Covid-19.
In a letter to the joint standing… [+1813 chars]
